Loanbook

Source: vignettes/data_loanbook.Rmd
data_loanbook.Rmd

Loanbook dataset

Loanbook dataset, prepared by the user as the raw input for the PACTA for Banks software.

The pacta.loanbook package provides an example loanbook dataset loanbook_demo.

loanbook_demo
